item.title: The Left Has Abandoned Rational Debate And Embraced Political Violence
item.description: The aftermath of Charlie Kirk’s murder should leave no doubt: the left has become a political movement predicated on violence and coercion.

item.title: Pro-Life Sanctuary Cities Aren’t Political Theater, They’re Actually Saving Lives
item.description: These city ordinances are not 'hollow gestures,' but real-world solutions that make an actual difference in the fight against abortion.
